name: GContainer
short_description:
A little library providing GContainerable and GChildable interfaces compatibles with GtkContainer and GtkWidget relationship.

Their basic implementations (GContainer and GChild) and a custom one (GBin) are provided either to be used as base classes and as examples of implementation.
summary: A GObject based library providing generic container interface.
